scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:samples: npm run test:samples:js && npm run test:samples:ts
scripts.test:samples:js: npm run test:sample:js:legacy && npm run test:sample:js:coverage:legacy && npm run test:sample:js:legacy-remote && npm run test:sample:js:coverage:legacy-remote && npm run test:sample:js:remote && npm run test:sample:js:coverage:remote && npm run test:sample:js:basic-authent && npm run test:sample:js:legacy:split-opa && npm run test:sample:js:remote:split-opa
scripts.test:coverall: rimraf .nyc_output && jest --coverageDirectory .nyc_output --coverageReporters json && nyc --silent --no-clean npm run test:e2e && nyc merge .nyc_output .nyc_output/final/coverage.json && nyc report --temp-dir .nyc_output/final/ --report-dir coverage --branches 80 --functions 80 --lines 80 --statements 80
scripts.clean: npm uninstall -g ui5-test-runner puppeteer nyc selenium-webdriver playwright webdriverio jsdom
